Text: Hey guys... for those that have tried it, did it work for you, or maybe I was just lucky and I should stop seeding it? And BTW, I just played Assasins creed 3 and the only time it was shaking was when I feel off of the high ledge, but mostly I didn't feel it at all... maybe games don't utilize it that much. Or maybe I just didn't realize it in the heat of the battle, cause' I wasn't really paying attention, just realized it afterwords.
